mapping_justification: Close mapping - organizational type categorization alignment
comment: ROR provides specific organizational categorization

mapping_justification: Direct semantic equivalence for educational institutions
comment: Confirmed with UC System example record

mapping_justification: Semantic equivalence - both represent funding organizations
comment: New in v2.0 - explicitly identifies funding agencies

mapping_justification: Narrow mapping - healthcare to medical organization
comment: Healthcare organizations map to medical organizations

mapping_justification: Narrow mapping - company to corporation
comment: Commercial organizations map to corporations

mapping_justification: Narrow mapping - direct correspondence for archives
comment: Archives and archival organizations

mapping_justification: Narrow mapping - nonprofit to non-governmental organization
comment: Nonprofit organizations typically map to NGOs

mapping_justification: Narrow mapping - direct correspondence for government entities
comment: Government organizations and agencies

mapping_justification: Conservative mapping due to semantic ambiguity of facility type
comment: Facilities mapped to generic Organization to avoid assumptions

mapping_justification: Broad mapping - generic other type to base organization class
comment: Catch-all for organizations not fitting specific categories

mapping_justification: Primary identifier as PropertyValue with propertyID='ror' for structural consistency
comment: ROR ID wrapped in PropertyValue structure to maintain uniform identifier array format

mapping_justification: External identifiers as PropertyValue objects within identifier array
comment: Array of external identifier objects mapped to PropertyValue structures

mapping_justification: Exact mapping - identifier type as propertyID in PropertyValue
comment: Enum values (fundref, grid, isni, wikidata) become propertyID values

mapping_justification: Exact mapping - all identifier values as PropertyValue value array
comment: Array of all identifiers of this type becomes PropertyValue value property

mapping_justification: Preferred identifier as nested PropertyValue in valueReference
comment: Preferred identifier stored in valueReference with additionalType='preferred'

mapping_justification: Related mapping - status as structured property with name-value pair
comment: PropertyValue with name='registryStatus' and value from ROR enum (active, inactive, withdrawn)

mapping_justification: Primary organizational name with language context preserved
comment: ror_display names map to schema:name; non-English handled via inLanguage in StructuredValue

mapping_justification: Official English organizational designation
comment: English label names map directly to legalName property

mapping_justification: Official non-English names as StructuredValue with inLanguage
comment: Non-English labels preserved in PropertyValue structure for multilingual support

mapping_justification: Organizational aliases and acronyms as alternate names
comment: Both aliases and acronyms function as alternate name variants

mapping_justification: Type-safe semantic preservation via PropertyValue structure
comment: Numerical year preserved in PropertyValue due to ROR number type vs Schema.org Date type incompatibility

mapping_justification: Exact mapping - registered domains as structured institutional metadata
comment: Array of domain names preserved in PropertyValue structure for institutional identification

mapping_justification: Exact mapping - admin metadata as PropertyValue containing array of StructuredValues
comment: Administrative metadata with array of creation/modification StructuredValues for perfect structural preservation

mapping_justification: Exact mapping - creation metadata as structured object with semantic properties
comment: Creation metadata as StructuredValue with dateCreated and version properties

mapping_justification: Semantic equivalence - specific creation date within StructuredValue
comment: ISO date format for record creation within admin StructuredValue

mapping_justification: Semantic equivalence - direct version mapping within StructuredValue
comment: Schema version (1.0, 2.0, 2.1) as proper version property within creation StructuredValue

mapping_justification: Exact mapping - modification metadata as structured object with semantic properties
comment: Modification metadata as StructuredValue with dateModified and version properties

mapping_justification: Semantic equivalence - specific modification date within StructuredValue
comment: ISO date format for record modification within admin StructuredValue

mapping_justification: Semantic equivalence - direct version mapping within StructuredValue
comment: Schema version (1.0, 2.0, 2.1) as proper version property within modification StructuredValue

mapping_justification: Semantic equivalence - official organization websites
comment: Website URLs as primary organization URL array - semantic separation preserves intent

mapping_justification: Semantic equivalence - Wikipedia identity references
comment: Wikipedia pages as external identity references - handles multiple pages in array

mapping_justification: Semantic equivalence - location information maps to addresses
comment: Array of location objects with geographic details

mapping_justification: Related mapping - geographic identifier for location
comment: Integer identifier referencing GeoNames database

mapping_justification: Semantic equivalence - detailed geographic information
comment: Nested object containing location metadata

mapping_justification: Semantic equivalence - location name to locality
comment: Name of the geographic location

mapping_justification: Semantic equivalence - direct correspondence for coordinates
comment: Decimal latitude coordinate

mapping_justification: Semantic equivalence - direct correspondence for coordinates
comment: Decimal longitude coordinate

mapping_justification: Related mapping - continent as broader geographic region
comment: Two-letter continent codes (AF, AN, AS, EU, NA, OC, SA) - new in v2.1

mapping_justification: Related mapping - continent name as geographic region
comment: Continent names (Africa, Antarctica, Asia, Europe, etc.) - new in v2.1

mapping_justification: Semantic equivalence - ISO country code
comment: Two-letter ISO country codes

mapping_justification: Semantic equivalence - country name
comment: Full country names

mapping_justification: Semantic equivalence - state/province code
comment: 1-3 character subdivision codes - new in v2.1

mapping_justification: Semantic equivalence - state/province name
comment: State, province, or region names - new in v2.1

mapping_justification: Related mapping - organizational relationships
comment: Array of relationship objects to other organizations

mapping_justification: Related mapping - parent relationship type
comment: Enum: related, parent, child, successor, predecessor

mapping_justification: Semantic equivalence - direct parent relationship
comment: Organization has parent organization

mapping_justification: Semantic equivalence - direct child relationship
comment: Organization has child/subsidiary organization

mapping_justification: Related mapping - general organizational affiliation
comment: Related but not hierarchical relationship

mapping_justification: Related mapping - succession indicates replacement
comment: Organization succeeded by another organization

mapping_justification: Related mapping - predecessor indicates being replaced
comment: Organization preceded by another organization

mapping_justification: Semantic equivalence - identifier of related organization
comment: ROR ID of related organization

mapping_justification: Semantic equivalence - name of related organization
comment: Display name of related organization
